description: This program makes a directionally encoded color (DEC) map for DTI results.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Set prefix (and path) for output DWI data.

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Optional mask for picking out a region. Otherwise, only places with FA>0 are given coloration.

fa_thr.title: FA Threshold
fa_thr.description: For QC1 type of DEC images, use FFF to threshold where DEC values are calculated (default: 0.2).

fa_sca.title: FA Scale
fa_sca.description: For QC2 type of DEC images, use SSS to scale the FA weighting of what would otherwise be a 'classical' DEC map (default: 0.7).

workdir.title: Working Directory
workdir.description: Specify a working directory, which can be removed (default: '__WORKING_decmap').

no_clean.title: No Clean
no_clean.description: Do not delete temporary files when finishing.

qc_prefix.title: QC Prefix
qc_prefix.description: Set the prefix of the QC image files (default: 'PREFIX').

no_cmd_out.title: No Command Output
no_cmd_out.description: Do not save the command line call of this program and location where it was run.

no_qc_view.title: No QC View
no_qc_view.description: Turn off generating QC image files.
